column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is a good solid BBQ in Chicago. First time
column2: lines were winding around the building
column3: and seating was impossible. Second time
column5: earlier in the evening was a little more manageable. Still packed but not overwhelming. The brisket is delicious
column6: roasted chicken as well. I don't like BBQ all over the meat. I like to taste the meat and add the BBQ from the side. They do this their meats really well. Decent sides
